paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: 1 patient with a germline BRCA2 mutation

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Somatic BRCA2 mutations were detected in 4 BCs (1 BRCA1 and 3 BRCA2) and germline mutations in 5 (4 BRCA1 and 1 BRCA2).

functional_data.summary: Germline BRCA2 mutation detected in one patient.

variants.additional_notes: Only one germline BRCA2 mutation was reported.
key_quotes: Somatic BRCA1 and BRCA2 mutations were detected in 4 BCs (1 BRCA1 and 3 BRCA2) and germline mutations in 5 (4 BRCA1 and 1 BRCA2).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the context of germline mutations.
